entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 08:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
